name: Liam Catterson
profile:
Hello ladies and gentlemen, my name is Liam Catterson and this is my channel! I'll try and make this brief so I am not wasting your time. I am mainly a reactor on YouTube. I am a bisexual geek with a passion to create and care and is afraid of being normal haha. Anywho, I try my best to stick to a schedule but I hope you guys enjoy my reactions as much as I enjoy being able to dish them out for you to watch. I don't really do requests as time is pretty tight anyways and I don't want to be in any partnerships. I'd recommend following my Twitter account too as I may reveal information such as live streams etc but it's up to you. Hope you have fun and may the force be with you. Toodles.

Subscribe via Patreon for Extended Reactions!
https://www.patreon.com/liamcatterson

Banner and Thumbnail template designed by:
@Karto1989 - Twitter

Intro Song:
Rules of Nature - Jamie Christophersen
